name: YAWoFFA
overview: Name stands for "Yet Another Wheel of Fortune for Amiga". This version supports up to 4 players and was made by Zoopersoft Games and released in 2021 on AmigaLive. This is an Amigalive original and it's a fun one too for the whole family! YAWoFFA is a small word puzzle for Commodore Amiga which is played much the same way as other Wheel of Fortune games. Spin wheel, choose letters and solve words/sentences. You can also make your own puzzles. Just fill a textfile with questions and compress it with the pack program included on the disk. You can play your own puzzle by typing: yawoffa yourpuzzle.pak Read the included readme text for more information. Note: If you create a puzzle file you can send it to me and I can include it on the disk. Play as a single player or hot seat for up to 4 players. 8 puzzle categories. Easily make your own puzzles. Text-to-speech narration as well!
